content.label: Very challenging puzzle game. Can be very frustrating at times when stumped, and then very rewarding when you figure out the right combination to build the snowman. Great visuals.
If it were cheaper OR had more levels, I would have given 5 stars. Great little game to keep your mind working.
Great game: simple, complex, fun, and relaxing all at once.
Great game super fun and relaxing puzzles. Wish thete were more ievell,, thete should be an update! Id oay for it lol
Our family is hoping for more snowmen and snowwomen to build.
I love this game. The puzzle are challenging but not frustrating. It’s also quite soothing. My daughter calls that little guy “Hunty Dunty.”
Paid 4.99 and played through entire game in a few hours. Needs more levels for the cost of the game.
Loved the game but come on there was like 25 levels and the bonus world doesn’t really add more challenge just beat it over in this location

This game was amazing! I enjoyed playing this game in the evening. I like that the only “stress” was how to build the snowmen. No timers or other distractions. The animation was great too! I liked how the little guy greeted the snowmen as he passed through.

title.label: A good puzzle game is hard to build

content.label: And this one is absolutely delightful - super approachable puzzles with neat solutions in a simple world that warms the heart.
The puzzles get more complicated as you play. The kind of game I enjoy where planning ahead pays off.  Simple graphics with lovely thinking behind the design. Fun
I HATE puzzle games but I loved this one. Thank you so much for this game!!!

Thank you so much for dropping the price, I've been waiting years for it to drop (I use Appticker)! This would make a great Apple TV app (with cloud save)! I just gifted it to my bro as well. Ever thought of incorporating a level builder? It would be easy to implement, and would initiate organic sharing between your customers. Maybe then even add in a daily user created puzzle, to keep people coming back?

The game idea is amazing
The game controls is the worst control I have ever seen, u slide to move and hes going to another place or even another level! The map also very bar, u can’t zoom out to see where to go next!
5 dollars?  Nice game, but very overpriced!
I love this game.
Fairly easy puzzles overall, but SO relaxing and adorable. A perfect way to escape for a moment now and then. Ambient music adds to the charm.

title.label: The Best Game In a While

content.label: The game involves every feature you can think of. The design is beautiful!! Also this is a great game to sit down and relax during the night. If you don't like very big puzzle games I would not recommend this gamers you, but if you love puzzles that are simple yet complex than this is perfect for you. I'm surprised this is actually this cheap being the game has numbers and numbers of puzzles! Now that I have completed the game I would so recommend this to anyone!!

title.label: Lil fishy with all the 5 star ratings

content.label: The game appears to be a really good game with all the good ratings. Decided to give it a go. Graphics are nice but does not balance out the gameplay. The controls are hard to get used to and I love puzzle games but I lost it on the second puzzle. A little boring. Reviews must have been made by developers themselves or something, because it's definitely not worth the five dollars I've paid. Was originally going to put 2 stars, but that's only if this game was free. (Good bye.. five dollars..)
A very well thought-out, calming, and innovative game!
Nice experience.
One of my favorite games that I have ever played.

I mean honestly. I am looking around the room for the hidden camera!!! Obviously someone is being paid to write good reviews for this game because it isn't even a game, it's a *%#^ *joke!!! Doesn't even deserve one star
To the clouds for this crap!!!!
Great puzzle game. Please build more on a sequel!!!
This game is a relaxing, beautifully designed and simple puzzle game that is exactly what I needed in my life. ⛄️
Really fun

This is a beautiful puzzle app that is enjoyable to play. There are 5 achievements including a metapuzzle at the end that made the game doubly enjoyable. One complaint is that I wish the achievements were less cryptic. Overall, this game is definitely a recommend for those who enjoy puzzle apps.
Cray cray adorbs.
Crashes Repeatedly after just a minute or so. Can you please fix or give a refund? Thank you and buh-bye.
Love the graphics!!
I'm already addicted to this game and just downloaded it about 10 minutes ago!!
I have loved this on iPad and iPhone! The interface is straightforward, and your monster charming. Some of these puzzles are really difficult!
I Like to give the snowmen a long hug (by holding on them) when I finish making them
This game is everything and more

This is quite possibly the best app store game i have ever spent money on. I like how you're actually interacting with the environment. Once you get into it the little hedge maze starts to feel like a home and it's very sad when it's over.

title.label: Good game, but needs more for the $$$

content.label: This is a creative, relaxing, and great all around puzzle game.  Unfortunately I was able to complete the game the day I purchased it, working on it here and there throughout my day.  I would have liked to have seen more puzzles on possibly a new level with a new theme or something to that effect.  All in all great, but simply to short.

This is an amazingly designed game that was built to last for sure. The design in this game is incredible. Each level brings its own little surprise with it. There are a ton of levels that will last you a decent amount of time.A cool part about the game is the fact that it is challenging on half of the levels, but then the other half of them are nice and easy. This is great because after you finish a really tough level, or if you are still in one, it is nice to do an easy one to cool your mind for a little bit. In the car, this is a great game to play because it does not require Wifi, and it takes your mind off of the fact that you are in the car for another 2 hours:). The little things in it count too, like the incredibly soothing music and sounds made in the game. When I first installed the game, I was a little scratchy by the fact that it was said to be really challenging, until I realized that the challenge is what makes the game fun! I would definitely install this game if I were you!
The game crashed at least four times within the first 2 minutes that I opened it. Great concept, but needs an update asap.
This a pleasantly challenging game.

title.label: Fantastic brain teaser w relaxing music

content.label: I love these kinds of brain teasers that are a different direction than the norm. Very relaxing music. One of the most difficult puzzle games I've played yet, but still endearing.
Challenging and relaxing. Great work guys!
This puzzler is very simple yet challenging at the same time. It has attracted my attention and held onto it. I am 70% done and would love to find a game as good when I am finished.
Love it so much it makes me mad!
It keeps crashing
Great
This game does not have ham but is good
Amazing and soothing sound track game play its on point  I love this game

Love this game. I was a little skeptical buying it, because it looked really simple, but it's actually a very challenging puzzle game. Same thing with SPL-T in that sense. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is that I wish it had iCloud sync so that progress on my iPad was saved on my phone.
Great!
Serene, lovely and challenging. Great gameplay with a simple dynamic. Really thoughtful and complementary soundtrack. Love it.
